spec_data.Name: themonospot-base
spec_data.Description:
themonospot-base is core package for themonospot system. It install:
    - themonospot-base mono assembly (use from other gui applications)
    - themonospot-plugin-interface (use to write plugins)
    - themonospot-plugin-manager (use to load plugins at runtime)
    - xml language files
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 06:50:30 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Base component for themonospot system, parser/editor and content descriptor
